item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: If you could be anything you want I bet youd be disappointed. Am I right? Its hard to remember were alive for the first time. Its hard to remember were alive for the last time. Its hard to remember to live before you die. Its hard to remember that our lives are such a short time. Its hard to remember when it takes such a short time. Its hard to remember to live before you die. Its hard to remember. — Modest Mouse "Lives"
